snippet: One biographer called him America's "most peculiar and haunted of presidents." But for all his personal ghosts, Richard Nixon made perhaps the most important presidential trip in history. Forty years ago next week, he went to China.
abstract: One biographer called him America's "most peculiar and haunted of presidents." But for all his personal ghosts, Richard Nixon made perhaps the most important presidential trip in history. Forty years ago next week, he went to China.
